title: Software Engineer
description:
This role is open exclusively to Full\\-Stack developers with
 **3‚Äì6 years of hands\\-on experience** 
 , strong proficiency in the
 **MERN stack** 
 , and solid expertise in
 **TypeScript and JavaScript** 
 .
 
  





**About Elecbits** 
 ¬†¬†
 



  





 Elecbits is a tech\\-enabled B2B platform that helps Electronics Enterprises to go from an idea to a shelf ready, commercial Electronics Product. We cover the end\\-to\\-end intricacies involved in the Electronics product development \\& manufacturing cycle using 25\\+ micro\\-services on our platform.
 



  





 We are proud to have worked with more than 100 eminent enterprises, digitizing their product development and manufacturing lifecycle. Some notable names are Ola Electric, Urban Company, Maruti Suzuki, Bosch, V\\-guard, Luminous, Phone pe, Escorts Kubota, Napino, etc. We are the largest B2B Electronics development and manufacturing platform of its kind, having more than 3000 global Electronics manufacturers and suppliers on our platform.
 



 ¬†¬†
 



**Responsibilities \\-** 








1. Architect and build robust, scalable web applications using the MERN stack.
2. Write clean, maintainable code in TypeScript/JavaScript.
3. Develop intuitive, responsive UIs using Tailwind CSS, Material UI, and React hooks.
4. Integrate APIs, internal microservices, and third\\-party platforms
5. Collaborate with designers to convert wireframes into pixel\\-perfect interfaces.
6. Own the full development lifecycle ‚Äî from ideation to deployment and post\\-launch monitoring.
7. Optimize for performance, security, and scalability.
8. Participate in code reviews, tech discussions, and continuous improvement initiatives.
9. Partner with Engineering, Design, QA, and Operations teams to deliver high\\-quality features through agile methodology.
10. Facilitate sprint planning, backlog grooming, and sprint reviews ensuring smooth execution and alignment.
11. Anticipate and proactively address potential risks, blockers, or resource challenges during the delivery cycle.
12. Conduct retrospective sessions to identify improvement areas and enhance cross\\-team collaboration.



  





**The ideal candidate key requirements\\-:** 



1. 3\\-6 years of proven work experience in Software development.
2. Strong proficiency in TypeScript and JavaScript.
3. Experience with the MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node) stack.
4. Proficiency in front\\-end development using libraries like Tailwind CSS and Material UI.
5. Knowledge of React Query is a plus.
6. Strong knowledge of React hooks and best practices of development.
7. Knowledge of HTML, CSS, and front\\-end technologies.
8. Familiarity with RESTful APIs, database design and implementation using MongoDB.
9. Understanding of version control systems, preferably Git.
10. Strong problem\\-solving and analytical skills.
11. Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
12. Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
13. Attention to detail and a focus on delivering high\\-quality code.
14. Prior experience in an agile development environment is a plus.



  





**Why Join Us?** 



1. **No self\\-imposed limits** 
 : We encourage you to push your boundaries and reach your full potential.
2. **Disrupting the electronics industry** 
 : We're at the forefront of innovation and change.
3. **Energized environment** 
 : Our company's energy fuels growth and self\\-improvement.
4. **Good vibes only** 
 : We foster a positive and supportive atmosphere for all.



  





**Be a part of the Tech team that works toward Exponential¬†growth\\-:** 




 We are looking for immediate joiners with a maximum notice period of 1 month.

title: Junior Software Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Vita Nova is an innovative education consultancy dedicated to enhancing internationalisation in higher education. With a mission to enhance student prospects abroad and support institutions in global collaboration, the organisation provides strategic and academic guidance. Founded by a renowned educational expert with over two decades of experience, Vita Nova is committed to upholding its core values of knowledge\\-driven solutions, ethics, empathy, and continuous innovation. The organization offers services ranging from career guidance, profile building, and psychometric testing for students to consulting on partnership development and internationalization strategies for institutions.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 As a Junior Software Engineer at Vita Nova Educators, you will be at the heart of our technical operations. You will work closely with seniors to design, develop, and maintain software solutions that enhance the learning experience. This role is designed for a high\\-potential individual who is eager to apply their academic knowledge of Computer Science to real\\-world challenges. We are looking for someone who can build and design mobile apps, website development, and have hands\\-on experience in using design tools (Canva, Adobe, etc.).
 



  





**Required Technical Skills** 



* **Core Fundamentals:** 
 Strong understanding of Data Structures, Algorithms, and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOPS).
* **Programming:** 
 Proficiency in at least one major language (e.g., Python, Java, JavaScript, or C\\+\\+) along with App Development.
* **Database Knowledge:** 
 Basic understanding of SQL (MySQL/PostgreSQL) or NoSQL databases.
* **Web Technologies:** 
 Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and basic frameworks is a plus.
* **Tools:** 
 Basic knowledge of Git/GitHub for version control.



  





**Soft Skills \\& Competencies** 



* **Problem\\-Solving:** 
 A logical approach to solving complex technical hurdles.
* **Communication:** 
 Ability to explain technical concepts to non\\-technical team members.
* **Adaptability:** 
 Comfortable working in a fast\\-paced environment.
* **Ownership:** 
 A proactive attitude toward taking charge of assigned modules and seeing them through to completion.



  





**Qualifications** 




**Education:** 
 B.Tech / B.E. in Computer Science or Information Technology.
 



**Graduation Year:** 
 Recent graduates (2024/2025\\) or professionals with up to 2 years of experience.
 



**Location:** 
 Must be willing to work from our office in
 **Gurugram** 
 .

title: Intern - Software
description:
Valeo est une entreprise mondiale de haute technologie qui con√ßoit des solutions r√©volutionnaires pour r√©inventer la mobilit√©. Nous sommes un √©quipementier partenaire des constructeurs automobiles et des acteurs de la nouvelle mobilit√© dans le monde entier. Notre vision ? Inventer une mobilit√© plus verte et plus s√ªre, gr√¢ce √† des solutions ax√©es sur la conduite intuitive et la r√©duction des √©missions de CO2\\. Nous sommes leaders dans nos domaines d'activit√© et reconnus comme l'une des plus grandes entreprises innovantes au monde.
   

  

**We are seeking enthusiastic and talented Engineering Graduates to join our team as Interns, focusing on the dynamic field of Automotive Embedded Software. This internship offers hands\\-on experience in a fast\\-paced environment, working on cutting\\-edge technologies that power next\\-generation vehicles.Seeking enthusiastic Engineering Graduates for an Automotive Embedded Software Internship. Gain hands\\-on experience with cutting\\-edge technology for next\\-generation vehicles in a fast\\-paced environment.**
****Key Responsibilities****
**As a Graduate Intern, you will work closely with senior engineers and be an active member of the development and testing team, focusing on the following key areas\\~**
* Software Development and Implementation
* Code Development\\~ Assist in the development and modification of embedded C firmware for specific Electronic Control Unit (ECU) functions, adhering to coding standards (e.g., MISRA C).
* Module Integration\\~ Help integrate software modules (e.g., drivers, communication stacks, application code) into the main ECU software build.
* Documentation\\~ Maintain clear and concise documentation for the developed code modules and configurations.
* Configuration\\~ Learn and assist in the configuration of AUTOSAR or similar basic software layers (BSW) components.
* Testing, Debugging, and Quality Assurance
* Unit Testing\\~ Develop and execute basic Unit Tests for individual software components to ensure functional correctness.
* Debugging\\~ Utilize debugging tools (e.g., JTAG, in\\-circuit emulators) to identify, analyze, and resolve simple software defects/bugs in the embedded code.
* Integration Testing\\~ Support the team during integration testing phases, verifying the interaction between different software and hardware components.
* Test Scripting\\~ Write and maintain simple Python or similar scripts to automate repetitive testing tasks and process test data.
* Hardware \\& Communication Support
* Setup \\& Environment\\~ Assist in setting up and maintaining the hardware benches, development boards, and testing environments (e.g., flashing the ECU, verifying power supply).
* Data Analysis\\~ Monitor and capture vehicle network communication data (e.g., CAN messages) using tools like CANoe/CANalyzer for diagnostic and validation purposes.
* Troubleshooting\\~ Perform initial triage on hardware\\-software integration issues observed during testing.
* AI Tool Deployment Support\\~
* Programming Languages\\~ MATLAB Strong proficiency required. Ability to use the Database Toolbox and Statistics \\& Machine Learning Toolbox.
* Python\\~ Essential for understanding legacy scripts, data conversion pipelines, and Jupyter Notebooks on GCP
* Key Responsibilities\\~ Tooling \\& Automation Support\\~ Assist in the validation and deployment of in\\-house or commercial AI/ML\\-based tools used for code analysis, testing, or quality assurance pipelines.
* Learning and Process Adherence
* Process Compliance\\~ Understand and adhere to the established automotive development lifecycle (e.g., V\\-Model) and quality processes.
* Continuous Learning\\~ Actively participate in training sessions and mentorship programs to rapidly acquire domain knowledge in automotive electronics and industry standards (e.g., ISO 26262, ASPICE).
* Reporting\\~ Clearly report work status, issues, and test results to the assigned mentor/supervisor.


**Category**
**Must\\-to\\-Have**
**Nice\\-to\\-Have**
**Languages**
* C (Strong foundation and basic pointer concepts)
* C\\+\\+ (Basic object\\-oriented concepts)
* Python (Scripting for automation)
* MATLAB/Simulink (Model\\-based development)
* SQL querying in GCP


**Development Tools**
* Basic knowledge of IDEs (e.g., Eclipse)
* Version Control using Git or SVN
* Familiarity with Debugging Tools (e.g., GDB)
* Automotive tool chains like Vector CANoe/CANalyzer


**Testing Tools**
* Exposure to Unit Testing frameworks
* Basic knowledge of Test Automation frameworks (e.g., PyTest)


**Category**
**Must\\-to\\-Have**
**Nice\\-to\\-Have**
**Microcontrollers**
* Understanding of Microcontroller/Microprocessor architecture (e.g., memory, registers, peripherals)
* Exposure to Automotive\\-grade MCUs (e.g., AURIX, Renesas, NXP)


**Operating Systems**
* Basic concepts of Real\\-Time Operating Systems (RTOS) or Operating System concepts
* Knowledge of AUTOSAR layered architecture and basic concepts


**Hardware Exposure**
* Ability to read basic Schematics and Datasheets
* Experience with Hardware\\-In\\-the\\-Loop (HIL) setup


**Category**
**Must\\-to\\-Have**
**Nice\\-to\\-Have**
**Protocols**
* Basic understanding of serial communication\\~ UART, SPI, I2C
* Automotive communication protocols\\~ CAN, LIN, FlexRay, Ethernet


**Concepts**
* Understanding of Interrupts, Timers, and ADC
* Knowledge of Diagnostics (UDS/OBD) and Functional Safety (ISO 26262\\)


**Category**
**Must\\-to\\-Have**
**Nice\\-to\\-Have**
**Domain Knowledge**
* Basic understanding of vehicle electrical architecture
* Exposure to Power Electronics or electric vehicle (EV) concepts and Battery Management Systems (BMS).


**Category**
**Must\\-to\\-Have**
**Nice\\-to\\-Have**
**Domain Knowledge**
* Data Science \\& Machine Learning Fundamentals
* Proficiency in SQL (specifically with GCP)
* Time series Machine learning algorithms


****Hands\\-on Experience / Project Exposure****
**Candidates should highlight any experience in the following areas\\~**
* Academic Projects using microcontrollers like Arduino, Raspberry Pi, or any 8/16/32\\-bit MCU.
* Building and debugging simple embedded firmware from scratch.
* Developing Python scripts for data processing or simple automation tasks.
* Exposure to basic circuit design and prototyping (e.g., soldering, breadboarding).
* Participation in Technical Competitions or Hackathons related to robotics or embedded systems.Candidates should highlight experience in\\~


**Soft Skills (Essential For Intern Success)**
**These skills are crucial for thriving in a professional team environment\\~**
* Strong Analytical and Problem\\-Solving Abilities\\~ Ability to logically approach and debug complex problems.
* Eagerness to Learn\\~ A proactive attitude and genuine curiosity for automotive technology.
* Excellent Communication\\~ Ability to articulate technical concepts clearly to team members.
* Team Player\\~ Capable of collaborating effectively within a diverse team.
* Ownership and Accountability\\~ Taking responsibility for assigned tasks and meeting deadlines.


**We encourage students from the following engineering disciplines to apply\\~**
* Electronics \\& Communication Engineering (ECE)
* Electrical \\& Electronics Engineering (EEE)
* Instrumentation \\& Control Engineering (ICE)
* Computer Science Engineering (CSE)


**Position\\~**
 R\\&D Trainee/Apprentice/VIE
   

  

**D√©partement\\~**
 Software Design
   

  

**Schedule\\~**
 Temps plein
   

  

**Employee Status\\~**
 CDD (Fixed Term)
   

  

**Type de contrat\\~**
 Trainee / Internship
   

  

**Job Posting Date\\~**
 2026\\-01\\-11
   

  

*Join Us !
   

  

 Being part of our team, you will join\\~
   

  

* one of the largest global innovative companies, with more than 20,000 engineers working in Research \\& Development
* a multi\\-cultural environment that values diversity and international collaboration
* more than 100,000 colleagues in 31 countries... which make a lot of opportunity for career growth
* a business highly committed to limiting the environmental impact if its activities and ranked by Corporate Knights as the number one company in the automotive sector in terms of sustainable development


 More information on Valeo\\~ https\\~//www.valeo.com*

title: Full-Stack Developer (React Native)- Junior
description:
InfraSingularity aims to revolutionize the Web3 ecosystem as a pioneering investor and builder. Our long\\-term vision is to establish ourselves as the first\\-of\\-its\\-kind in this domain, spearheading the investment and infrastructure development for top web3 protocols.
 



  





 At IS, we recognize the immense potential of web3 technologies to reshape industries and empower individuals. By investing in top web3 protocols, we aim to fuel their growth and support their journey towards decentralization. Additionally, our plan to actively build infrastructure with these protocols sets us apart, ensuring that they have the necessary foundations to operate in a decentralized manner effectively.
 



  





 We embrace collaboration and partnership as key drivers of success. By working alongside esteemed web3 VCs like WAGMI and more, we can leverage their expertise and collective insights to maximize our impact. Together, we are shaping the future of the Web3 ecosystem, co\\-investing, and co\\-building infrastructure that accelerates the adoption and growth of decentralized technologies.
 



  





 Together with our portfolio of top web3 protocols (Lava, Sei, and Anoma) and our collaborative partnerships with top protocols (EigenLayer, Avail, PolyMesh, and Connext), we are creating a transformative impact on industries, society, and the global economy. Join us on this groundbreaking journey as we reshape the future of finance, governance, and technology.
 



  





 What we look for in you:
 



  




* 2\\-3 years experience as a software engineer working in a startup, working with JavaScript, Typescript, NextJS and backend frameworks like NodeJS, AWS.
* Working knowledge along with some experience with React, NextJS, and any relevant web3 libraries for frontend development.
* Experience as a React Native developer with the ability to build, deploy, and maintain both iOS and Android applications.
* Knowledge of Android development fundamentals, Gradle/Maven build tools, and ability to deploy apps to the Google Play Store and app store.
* Proven experience in developing and maintaining robust back\\-end systems
* Have a good understanding of MVVM architecture.
* Strong understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.
* Experience using Git in a professional/workplace environment.
* Excellent problem\\-solving skills and attention to detail
* Must be fluent in English and possess strong communication skills
* Ability to thrive in a fast\\-paced startup environment.
* You can write secure code that works quickly and efficiently.
* A customer\\-focused and product\\-focused mindset. You‚Äôre interested in using the right tool for the job and you understand, and can speak to, the ‚ÄúWhy‚Äù behind your choices.
* You can operate independently, be detail oriented, and deliver results in an organized manner.
* Ability to drive end\\-to\\-end features and lead projects autonomously.
* Demonstrated capacity to clearly and concisely communicate about complex technical, architectural, and/or organizational problems and propose thorough iterative solutions.
* Positive and solution\\-oriented mindset.
* An inclination towards communication, inclusion, and visibility.
* Experience with performance and optimization problems and a demonstrated ability to both diagnose and prevent these problems.



  





 Additional Requirements:
 


* Experience with any NodeOps ie. deployment and maintenance of PoS validators, Full nodes, etc.
* Experience working with Polymesh blockchain is a plus.
* Awareness of new developments and tech trends in the web3 space: Modular, ZK networks, Restaking, etc.
* Working knowledge of popular frontend frameworks.



  





 Good to Have:
 


* Understanding of DAML for smart contract\\-style workflows
* Experience or familiarity with the Canton ecosystem
* Understanding the architecture and flow of Feature Apps
* Build strong, resilient, and robust FinTech and NFT decentralized applications
* Work closely with management and product team to rapidly iterate, experiment and launch products
* Integrate with various blockchains such as Ethereum, and L2s, Solana, and Algorand
* Architect and build smart contracts
* Familiarity and interest with NFTs and digital collectibles as a product.
* Build secure smart contract protocols and backend services
* Mentor and train other team members on smart contract best practices
* Solid understanding of blockchain technology, the Ethereum blockchain, and smart contracts development on major public blockchains.

title: C# Developer (Azure, Terraform) | Freelancing | 100% Remote

 Travitons Technologies Pvt. Ltd. specializes in software development, outsourcing, and engineering services. The company focuses on delivering tailored technology solutions to meet the needs of diverse industries. Known for its innovative approach, Travitons Technologies leverages cutting\\-edge technology to drive efficiency and growth. The organization is committed to fostering a collaborative and results\\-driven work environment.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote freelancing role for a C\\# Developer with expertise in Azure and Terraform. The role involves designing, developing, and maintaining backend systems and software applications, ensuring scalable and robust solutions. The developer will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, write efficient code, and implement object\\-oriented programming practices. Additional responsibilities include deploying applications using Azure services and Terraform for infrastructure as code (IaC) automation.
   




**Qualifications**
* Strong foundation in Computer Science and knowledge of Software Development principles
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Programming, specifically C\\#
* Experience with Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) methodologies
* Expertise in deploying and managing applications in Azure cloud environments
* Proficiency in working with Terraform for Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
* Effective problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work in a collaborative remote team environment
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is preferred
* Experience in freelancing or remote work will be considered an asset

title: Java Full Stack
description:
TCS has been a great pioneer in feeding the fire of young techies like you. We are a global leader in the technology arena and there‚Äôs nothing that can stop us from growing together.
 



**What we are looking for**

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Job Title : Senior Software Engineer (.NET)
 



 Years of Experience : 6\\+ years
 



 Location : Chennai One (IT Park) \\- Thoraipakkam
 



  





**About OEC:**




 OEC provides high\\-quality technology solutions to automakers and their franchised dealers which facilitate the sale of Original Equipment (OE) replacement parts. Using advanced, leading technology, OEC in the past 20 years, has extended this mission by providing constant support for over 50 international auto brands, and more than 150,000 dealership and repair customers worldwide, being now a leader in the segment of the automotive market through continued innovation and subject matter expertise.
 



  





 We power connections to keep our world up and running. OEC is the leading technology provider for the automotive aftersales industry, creating networks that support manufacturers, dealers, repairers, and insurers to allow our connected customers and vehicle owners to thrive.
 



  





**Job Summary/Objective :**




 Participates in the full development cycle for creating technology solutions for OEC, from design to delivery \\& maintenance. Leads design sessions and code reviews. Defines and resolves root causes of problems and creates proactive solutions. Recommends, champions, and implements new technologies. Provides technical leadership to development teams, and provides coaching to junior level team members.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities \\& Duties (essential to the job) :**



1. Performs system analysis and design, and assists architectural design of major/strategic projects and recommends technical performance improvements. Leads design sessions and code reviews with multiple teams; provides extensive feedback and suggestions to ensure quality deliverables.
2. Adheres to set production processes and follows scheduled plans and timelines utilizing established programming/development guidelines to meet key activity goals.
3. Leads coding concept discussions and promotes reuse opportunities as appropriate.
4. Maintains current knowledge of service level agreements. Offers production support as aligned with agreement requirements. Participates in post\\-production support.
5. Interacts regularly with functional teams including (but not limited to) Marketing, Product, Customer Care, and Quality to gather and disseminate information regarding product builds and progress.
6. Executes test procedures according to test plan and identifies problems; performs unit and integration testing for functionality and limits; performs bug verification, release testing, and support for assigned products.
7. Writes module\\-level implementation and test specifications; tracks key activities. Produces comprehensive, usable software documentation.
8. Serves as primary contact for deployments on a regular basis.
9. Estimates development changes and ensures all stake holders are apprised of effort and duration for each development task.
10. Assists with monitoring, maintaining and developing QA environments.
11. Reviews test cases/plans and assists with migration contingency plans.
12. Provides technical leadership to development teams through the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) of large, complex projects.
13. Participates in the interview and selection process with job candidates, and influences staffing plans and decisions.



  





**Ideal Experience and Skills:** 



* Bachelor's or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
* 6\\+ Years of experience working in C\\#, .Net, .Net Framework 4\\.6 or greater (C\\#), .Net Core (C\\#), MVC, MS SQL, Web application development, and API integration.
* Hands\\-on experience in React, Redux
* Having knowledge working on Azure devops.
* A Solid understanding in webservices and API development.
* Experience utilizing Git repositories.
* Solid experience in relational databases and writing SQL queries, preferably with SQL Server.
* Experience with distributed systems in an SOA environment.
* Solid understanding and utilization of OOD principle.



  





**Perks and Benefits:** 



* Relaxed, safe, friendly work atmosphere and flexible working patterns
* Competitive salary and benefits
* Retiral benefits, Employee referral bonus, Annual Incentive/Bonus Plan
* Access to online courses through LinkedIn Learning
* Group Medical Insurance
* Sodexo food coupon
* Hybrid work model



  





**What Makes Working at OEC Awesome?** 




  





 We have a new OEC Technology Centre of Excellence in Chennai, India! Our team is beyond thrilled to work with the new office, but we‚Äôre even more excited for the innovation and creativity that this living space will certainly inspire! We believe in surrounding ourselves with not only the best and the brightest individuals, but those that are unique and purpose\\-driven in all that they do. OEC India has been selected as one of the ‚ÄòTop 25 Safest Workplaces in India‚Äô by KelpHR.
 



  





 OEC provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, colour, religion, creed, gender, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, and related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, genetic information or characteristics, marital status, familial status, veteran or military status, status regarding public assistance, membership or activity in a local commission, or any other protected status in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws

title: Senior SaaS Backend - Unpaid - Voluntary
description:
Job Title: Senior SaaS Backend Architect (Node.js / Nest.JS ) ‚Äì Volunteer
   

  

 Organisation: The Tann Mann Gaadi (A ‚ÄúNot for Profit‚Äù Trust)
   

 Location: Remote (Volunteer Role)
   

 Type: Unpaid / Volunteer
   

 Commitment: Flexible hours (5‚Äì15 hrs per week preferred)
   

  

  

 \\-\\-\\-
   

  

 About The Tann Mann Gaadi
   

  

 The Tann Mann Gaadi is a ‚ÄúWellness on Wheels‚Äù initiative under a non\\-profit trust that aims to combat open defecation and promote sanitation, health, and sustainability in developing regions. Our mission integrates technology, innovation, and social responsibility to create scalable, eco\\-friendly impact solutions.
   

  

 Visit: https://thetannmanngaadi.org
   

  

  

 \\-\\-\\-
   

  

 Role Overview
   

  

 We are looking for a Senior SaaS Backend Architect ( Node.js / Nest.JS ) to lead and design the backend structure of our Fashion Retail Software and other digital platforms supporting our social initiatives.
   

 This role is ideal for someone with 10\\+ years of professional experience or a strong Node.js developer (with at least 8 year of experience) who has a deep understanding of architecture and a passion for meaningful social projects.
   

  

  

 \\-\\-\\-
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

 Design and implement backend architecture using Node.js, Express.js, and related frameworks.
   

 And define API ensuring models, and ensure scalability and security.
   

  

 Collaborate with frontend, database, and UI/UX teams to build a cohesive system.
   

  

 Optimise backend performance and implement best coding practices.
   

  

 Ensure integration with external systems (payment, authentication, logistics, etc.).
   

  

 Provide technical mentorship to junior developers and volunteers.
   

  

 Participate in code reviews and contribute to architectural decisions.
   

  

 Document backend processes and maintain project repositories.
   

  

  

  

 \\-\\-\\-
   

  

 Required Skills \\& Qualifications
   

  

 Proficiency in Node.js, Express.js, and RESTful API design.
   

  

 Strong knowledge of databases (MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL).
   

  

 Understanding of MVC architecture, microservices, and API gateways.
   

  

 Familiarity with authentication (JWT, OAuth) and security best practices.
   

  

 Experience with cloud deployment (AWS, Azure, or similar) preferred.
   

  

 Excellent problem\\-solving skills and clean coding habits.
   

  

 Collaborative mindset with strong communication skills.
   

  

  

  

 \\-\\-\\-
   

  

 Preferred Qualifications
   

  

 10\\+ years of experience in backend development (preferred)
   

 OR
   

  

 8\\+ years of experience with a solid understanding of architecture design and eagerness to learn.
   

  

 Experience in social impact, non\\-profit, or open\\-source projects is a plus.
   

  

  

  

 \\-\\-\\-
   

  

 What You‚Äôll Gain
   

  

 Opportunity to lead architecture decisions for a real\\-world impact project.
   

  

 Experience working in a social\\-tech ecosystem.
   

  

 Networking and mentorship opportunities with experienced professionals.
   

  

 A volunteer certificate recognising your contribution to a national\\-level social cause.
   

  

 Please email at join@thetannmanngaadi.org

title: QA Architect (Playwright | Performance | Architecture)
description:
Principal ‚Äì Automation Engineer Role
 



  





**Experiences: 10 ‚Äì 15 Years** 




**Notice Period: Immediate Joiner** 




**Mandatory Skills: Automation, Playwright, Performance testing and Architecture experiences.** 




  





**Job Description:** 




 Architectural and Strategic Leadership
 


* Define Testing Architecture: Architect and drive the implementation of next\\-generation automation and performance testing frameworks, ensuring high scalability, robustness, and maintainability across all product lines.
* Best Practices and Standards: Establish and enforce quality engineering best practices, coding standards, and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines across the entire testing organization.
* System Integration: Lead technical evaluations and integration of new testing tools and technologies to improve efficiency, coverage, and time\\-to\\-market.
* Mentorship and Coaching: Act as a technical mentor and coach for Senior and Lead Engineers, raising the overall technical acumen and quality mindset of the team.



 Core Technical Focus Areas
 


* **Deep Expertise in Playwright** 
 : Own the design and implementation of robust, resilient end\\-to\\-end (E2E) automation frameworks using Playwright (TypeScript/JavaScript). Drive innovative solutions for testing complex, single\\-page applications (SPAs) and micro\\-frontend architectures.
* **Performance Engineering with k6** 
 : Establish and execute a comprehensive performance testing strategy. Design and run high\\-volume load, stress, and spike tests using k6 (or similar modern tools), analyze results, and partner with development teams to identify and resolve critical performance bottlenecks.
* Quality Metrics \\& Reporting: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) for quality, including defect trends, test execution time, and stability, creating automated dashboards for executive visibility.



 Required Qualifications
 


* Experience: 10\\+ years of progressive experience in Software Development and Quality Engineering roles, with at least 3 years operating at a Principal Engineer level.
* Educational Background: Bachelor‚Äôs or master‚Äôs degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related technical field.
* Automation Mastery: Expert\\-level, hands\\-on experience in building and scaling complex end\\-to\\-end automation frameworks, with deep practical knowledge of Playwright.
* Performance Expertise: Proven track record of designing, scripting, and executing large\\-scale performance and load testing initiatives using k6 or equivalent modern tools (e.g., Gatling, JMeter).
* Programming Languages: Strong proficiency in at least one modern language essential for automation (e.g., TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, or Java).
* System Knowledge: Extensive experience with testing complex distributed systems, microservices, cloud environments
* CI/CD: Expertise in integrating automation and performance tests into DevOps pipelines (e.g., GitHub Actions, Jenkins, GitLab CI).
